attributes.action: sack all the proffesionals involved in the baby p case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all proffesionals who had contact with baby p and failed to notice the abuse this poor baby was subjected to should lose their jobs as they are obviously in the wrong type of work. observational skils are a big part of jobs in social care and these individuals failed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
